data.title: John Stephen Stark Obituary 2020
data.meta_description: John Stephen Stark, 63, of Indianapolis, passed away on Thursday, June 18, 2020 at his home due to cardiac arrest.  He was born on January 30, 1957 to John R. and Bonnie J. (Gar...
data.text:
John Stephen Stark, 63, of Indianapolis, passed away on Thursday, June 18, 2020 at his home due to cardiac arrest. He was born on January 30, 1957 to John R. and Bonnie J. (Gardner) Stark in Indianapolis, Indiana.

Steve loved playing music, gardening, and going boating. He also loved Katie, his canine companion.

He is survived by his mother, Bonnie Jean Stark and his sister, Rebecca Stark Boulse.

Steve was preceded in death by his father, John Raymond Stark.

Visitation will be from 2:00 pm to 4:00 pm, with services at 4:00 pm, on Wednesday, June 24, 2020 at Randall & Roberts Funeral Center, 1685 Westfield Road in Noblesville, with Rev. Stanley R. Sutton officiating.

Memorial contributions may be made to Humane Society for Hamilton County, 1721 Pleasant Street, Suite B, Noblesville, IN 46060.

Condolences: www.randallroberts.com
